name: English
app_download_subtitle: Ready as an app, comes with more unique features.
redirecting_description: If you're not being redirected to the app, please click the button below. If it still doesn't work, please check if you have the app installed or properly configured in your device settings.

distributions.desktop_desc: Desktop distribution via Tauri. Provides exclusive features (e.g. render mode).
distributions.mobile_desc: Mobile distribution via Capacitor. Incompatibilities and performance issues expected.
distributions.other_desc: ARM64 distributions for Linux and Windows, x64 for Intel Macs, IPA, debug builds, etc.

resolve_url_description.0: The following URL was detected in your clipboard:
resolve_url_description.1: Would you like to resolve it as a ZIP or a plain file, or ignore it instead?

autoplay_description: Notes are automatically given Perfect judgments.
adjust_offset_description: Enables realtime chart offset adjustment. The offset set in the preferences is ignored.
practice_description: Both inputs and playback controls are enabled.
render_description: The canvas will be rendered and saved as a video file.
autostart_description: Attempts to start playing automatically after the chart is loaded.
new_window_description: The player will open in a new window.
new_tab_description: The player will open in a new tab.
ffmpeg_not_found: FFmpeg could not be found on your system.
odd_dimensions_warning: Some encoders may not support resolutions with odd dimensions.
rendering_not_available: Rendering is not available in this environment. Please switch to a different OS or enable cross-origin isolation.
error_file_not_found: Unable to locate {filename} while importing resource pack {packname}.
error_ffmpeg_not_found: FFmpeg could not be found on your system. Do you want to install it?
error_rendering_unavailable: Video rendering is not available in this environment. Please use a browser that supports SharedArrayBuffer (requires HTTPS or localhost).

use_the_app_description.0: It looks like some files can be resolved. You might want to proceed with the PhiZone Player app if you have it installed. Otherwise, you can either

remember_choice_description: If enabled, this dialog will not be shown again.

new_version_guidances.1: Please update the app via TestFlight.
new_version_guidances.2: Click to go to the GitHub releases page.

version_check_failed: Failed to contact GitHub to check for updates.
